param.label: Test Name
param.name: test_name
param.help: Test name to connect client with simulated backend failures.

param.label: Failure Type
param.name: failure_state
param.help: If set, FailsJobRunner fails with this runner state.

param.label: Initial Destination
param.name: initial_destination
param.help: If set, initial destination to route job to.

param.label: Run For
param.name: run_for
param.help: If greater than 0, wait this long before triggering runtime failure state (memory or walltime).
